name: Transatlantic Underwater VR
description:
This app is a virtual reality diving simulation, here you will experience diving around several shipwrecks including a visit to:

- Transatlantic Shipwreck
- Pirate Shipwreck
- Crashed Helicopter
- Crashed Plane
- Sunken Tank
- Sunken Cargo Ship
- Crashed UFO
- Sunken Pyramid
- Sunken Ancient City

You will enjoy the company of several kind of fishes like sharks, manta rays, eels, tunas and many others.

This simulation works with Google Cardboard.
